text:
You have reached `conclusion.json`.

This concludes the hands-on tour of the Baseline Engine. 

We have covered:
- Node navigation (`transition`)
- Dynamic text (`text_conditionals`)
- Inventory (`pickup`, `requires`)
- Visibility (`visible`, `reveals`)
- State management (`set_state`)

Thank you for participating in this test protocol. Your data has been... discarded. 

Type 'end' to terminate the session.
